Daniel Bell Research Files on U.S. Communism, Socialism, and the Labor Movement
Daniel Bell Research Files on U.S. Communism, Socialism, and the Labor Movement

Connecticut SP Documents.Contents: Minutes of the convention at New Haven, 1906; constitutions, 1906 and 1909; election material: letter of nomination and acceptance letter of E. D. Hall for SP nomination for Governor, 1906; state SP platforms of 1906, 1912, 1913; sample ballots for 1910, 1912; party bulletins and resolutions; clippings concerning the SP in office
